c:group.name: RuntimeEngineDeployer
c:group.displayName: Runtime Engine Properties (restart required before modifications take effect)

c:simple-property.name: allow-env-function
c:simple-property.description: Allow the execution of ENV function (default false).

c:simple-property.name: async-thread-pool
c:simple-property.description: Thread Pool to be used with Asynchronous operations in Teiid

c:simple-property.name: query-timeout
c:simple-property.description: Set the default query timeout for all queries in milliseconds. 0 indicates no timeout. Lesser timeout values may be set per VDB or by clients (default 0).

c:simple-property.name: max-row-fetch-size
c:simple-property.description: Maximum allowed fetch size, set via JDBC. User requested value ignored above this value (default 20480).

c:simple-property.name: max-active-plans
c:simple-property.description: Increase this value on highly concurrent systems - but ensure that the underlying pools can handle the increased load without timeouts.(default 20)

c:simple-property.name: time-slice-in-millseconds
c:simple-property.description: Query processor time slice, in milliseconds. (default 2000)

c:simple-property.name: lob-chunk-size-in-kb
c:simple-property.description: The max lob chunk size in KB transferred to the client for xml, blobs, clobs (default 100KB)

c:simple-property.name: query-threshold-in-seconds
c:simple-property.description: Length of time in seconds before a query is considered long running

c:simple-property.name: detect-change-events
c:simple-property.description: Set to true for the engine to detect local change events. Should be disabled if using external change data capture tools. (default true)

c:simple-property.name: resultset-cache-enable
c:simple-property.description: Denotes whether or not result set caching is enabled (default true).

c:simple-property.name: resultset-cache-name
c:simple-property.description: Infinispan cache name for resultset; if not specified default cache on infinispan container is used.

c:simple-property.name: resultset-cache-max-staleness
c:simple-property.description: Max staleness in seconds. Modifications are based upon data updates -1 indicates no max (default 60).

c:simple-property.name: preparedplan-cache-name
c:simple-property.description: Infinispan cache name for prepared plans

c:simple-property.name: buffer-service-max-buffer-space
c:simple-property.description: Max file storage space, in MB, to be used for buffer files (default 50G).

c:simple-property.name: buffer-service-processor-batch-size
c:simple-property.description: The max row count of a batch sent internally within the query processor. Should be <= the connectorBatchSize (default 512).

c:simple-property.name: buffer-service-connector-batch-size
c:simple-property.description: The max row count of a batch from a connector. Should be even multiple of processorBatchSize. (default 1024)

c:simple-property.name: buffer-service-max-processing-kb
c:simple-property.description: The approximate amount of buffer memory in kilobytes allowable for a single processing operation (sort, grouping, etc.) regardless of existing memory commitments. -1 means to automatically calculate a value (default -1).

c:simple-property.name: buffer-service-max-file-size
c:simple-property.description: Max file size for buffer files (default 2GB)

c:simple-property.name: buffer-service-max-reserve-kb
c:simple-property.description: The approximate amount of memory in kilobytes allowed to be held by the buffer manager. -1 means to automatically calculate a value (default -1).

c:simple-property.name: buffer-service-memory-buffer-space
c:simple-property.description: Memory buffer space used by the buffer manager in MB. -1 determines the setting automatically from the max-reserve-kb (default -1). This value cannot be smaller than max-storage-object-size.

c:simple-property.name: buffer-service-memory-buffer-off-heap
c:simple-property.description: Set to true to hold the memory buffer off-heap. If true you must ensure that the VM can allocate that much direct memory (default false).

c:simple-property.name: buffer-service-max-storage-object-size
c:simple-property.description: The maximum size of a buffer managed object (typically a table page or a results batch) in bytes (default 8388608 or 8MB). Setting this value too high will reduce the effectiveness of the memory buffer.

c:simple-property.name: buffer-service-inline-lobs
c:simple-property.description: Set to true to allow inlining of memory based and small lobs into results. However inline lob values are not supported by pre-7.6 clients, so disable this property if using older clients utilizing lobs (default true).

c:simple-property.name: JDBCTransportConfiguration.pg-max-lob-size-in-bytes
c:simple-property.displayName: Postgres Max LOB Size in Bytes
c:simple-property.description: Max LOB size in Postgres protocol, as streaming is not supported

c:simple-property.name: JDBCTransportConfiguration.socket-binding
c:simple-property.description: Socket binding to be used for the transport

c:simple-property.name: JDBCTransportConfiguration.max-socket-threads
c:simple-property.description: Max number of threads dedicated to initial request processing. Zero indicates the system default of max available processors. (default 0) Setting this value above the max available processors is not recommended.

c:simple-property.name: JDBCTransportConfiguration.input-buffer-size
c:simple-property.description: SO_RCVBUF size, 0 indicates that system default should be used (default 0)

c:simple-property.name: JDBCTransportConfiguration.output-buffer-size
c:simple-property.description: SO_SNDBUF size, 0 indicates that system default should be used (default 0)

c:simple-property.name: JDBCTransportConfiguration.ssl-mode
c:simple-property.description: Can be one of disabled, login, or enabled. Disabled = no transport or message level security will be used; Enabled = traffic will be secured using this configuration, if the client supports SSL; Login = only the login traffic will be encrypted at a message level using 128 bit AES with an ephemerial DH key exchange. No other config values are needed in this mode and it only applies to the JDBC transport

c:simple-property.name: JDBCTransportConfiguration.authentication-security-domain
c:simple-property.description: Security domain to be enforced with the transport

c:simple-property.name: JDBCTransportConfiguration.authentication-max-sessions-allowed
c:simple-property.description: Maximum number of sessions allowed by the system (default 5000).

c:simple-property.name: JDBCTransportConfiguration.authentication-sessions-expiration-timelimit
c:simple-property.description: Max allowed time before the session is terminated by the system, 0 indicates unlimited (default 0).

c:simple-property.name: ODBCTransportConfiguration.pg-max-lob-size-in-bytes
c:simple-property.displayName: Postgres Max LOB Size in Bytes
c:simple-property.description: Max LOB size in Postgres protocol, as streaming is not supported

c:simple-property.name: ODBCTransportConfiguration.socket-binding
c:simple-property.description: Socket binding to be used for the transport

c:simple-property.name: ODBCTransportConfiguration.max-socket-threads
c:simple-property.description: Max number of threads dedicated to initial request processing. Zero indicates the system default of max available processors. (default 0) Setting this value above the max available processors is not recommended.

c:simple-property.name: ODBCTransportConfiguration.input-buffer-size
c:simple-property.description: SO_RCVBUF size, 0 indicates that system default should be used (default 0)

c:simple-property.name: ODBCTransportConfiguration.output-buffer-size
c:simple-property.description: SO_SNDBUF size, 0 indicates that system default should be used (default 0)

c:simple-property.name: ODBCTransportConfiguration.ssl-mode
c:simple-property.description: Can be one of disabled, login, or enabled. Disabled = no transport or message level security will be used; Enabled = traffic will be secured using this configuration, if the client supports SSL; Login = only the login traffic will be encrypted at a message level using 128 bit AES with an ephemerial DH key exchange. No other config values are needed in this mode and it only applies to the JDBC transport

c:simple-property.name: ODBCTransportConfiguration.authentication-security-domain
c:simple-property.description: Security domain to be enforced with the transport

c:simple-property.name: ODBCTransportConfiguration.authentication-max-sessions-allowed
c:simple-property.description: Maximum number of sessions allowed by the system (default 5000).

c:simple-property.name: ODBCTransportConfiguration.authentication-sessions-expiration-timelimit
c:simple-property.description: Max allowed time before the session is terminated by the system, 0 indicates unlimited (default 0).
